description: This file contains utility functions for processing messages and images, specifically for formatting messages into a specific message class structure and handling images for messaging, including encoding local images to base64 and handling different message roles.

classes.name: MistralMessage
classes.description: A union type representing different message classes from mistralai.models, used for message formatting.

methods.name: _format_image_for_message
methods.description: Converts an Image object into an ImageURLChunk, handling URL, file path, and byte content cases.

methods.name: format_messages
methods.description: Converts a list of Message objects into a list of MistralMessage objects, handling different roles and message content types.
